name: Growing Danger
description:
In this game you have to protect an infinit growing flower because the flower's blossom has attraction like earth and attracts everything, so you have to protect it from things like stones by clicking them to destroy them  and watch out that only water touches the flower. You can even grow up to space but there are meteorites that are smaller and harder to click.

Soundtrack:

Funny Bit by David Renda on fesliyanstudios.com

game start sound effect:

Game Start by plasterbrain on pixabay.com
